## ScreenReaderClient.on() method

Registers a listener for the `error` event, that will be called if an error happens in the connection with the screen reader.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(event: "error", listener: (error: any) => void): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | "error" | <code>&quot;error&quot;</code> |
|  listener | (error: any) =&gt; void | function to be called with the error<!-- -->The listener can removed with [ScreenReaderClient.off()](./assistive-playwright-client.screenreaderclient.off.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
